 program atcoder_ABC134_E

 implicit none

 integer :: n, i, num, current_size

 integer, allocatable :: keys(:), counts(:)

 integer :: insertion_pos

 integer :: insertion_pos_final, index_floor, count_val， found

 begin:

 read*, n

 allocate(keys(n), counts(n))

 current_size =0

 do i=1,n

     read*, num

    ! 第一步: compute insertion_pos for floor.

     call find_insertion_pos(keys, current_size, num, insertion_pos)

     exists_floor = .false.

     if ( insertion_pos >1 ) then

         exists_floor = .true.

         index_floor = insertion_pos-1

         count_val = counts(index_floor)

         if (count_val ==1) then

             !移除该元素.

             do j:index_floor, current_size-1

                 keys(j) = keys(j+1)

                 counts(j) = counts(j+1)

             end do

             current_size = current_size -1

         else

             counts(index_floor) = count_val-1

         end if

     end if

     ! 现在重新compute the insertion_pos for the num.

     call find_insertion_pos(keys, current_size, num, insertion_p2)

     found=.false.

     if (insertion_p2 <= current_size) then

         if (keys(insertion_p2) == num) then

             found = .true.

             counts(insert_p2)=counts(insertion_p2)+1

         end if

     end if

     if (.not. found) then

         ! 插入该元素 at position insertion_p2

         ! shift after.

         ! 注意： current_size 是 current_size_before = current_size

        allocate the space, but using our preallocated arrays.

         do j = current_size, insertion_p2, -1

            keys(j+1)=keys(j)

            counts(j+1)=counts(j)

         end do

         keys(insertion_p2)=num

         counts(insertion_p2)=1

         current_size = current_size +1

     end if

 end do

! 统计所有 counts:

 sum_ans =0

 do i=1, current_size
